SILVER - Individual Market Analysis

CoT signals and diagnostics for Silver futures.

As of 2025-10-14

Gemini Summary

State of the Market Summary:

  • Silver futures exhibit significant speculative outflow of -8.61% over the last four weeks. The latest price is $46.80.
  • The market currently displays "Crowded Short Risk," primarily driven by speculative positioning (Crowded_Short_Risk_ShortCover).

Technical Summary:

  • Speculators' net positioning z-score is -1.79, indicating they are nearing extreme short levels.
  • Hedgers are actively covering shorts, reflected by their z-score of 1.83, suggesting reduced short exposure.
  • The 4-week flow is fading (momentum -2.25), and a reversal score of 3 highlights an elevated tactical reversal setup.
  • Hedgers are in a "Shortage_or_Stress" regime, with observed divergence between speculators and hedgers.

References:

  • Silver_CoT_Signals (Latest: 2025-10-14).
  • The analysis was primarily influenced by `Flow_4w`, `Spec_zscore`, `crowd_alert`, and `reversal_score`.
  • Public daily spot price data would improve future price-signal alignment and timing analysis.
  • Overall Open Interest data from a public source would enhance insights into market depth.
